string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: If it cannot run, thats not the end.
If it fails, then check the code once again.
Run, debug, run, debug is a day to day activity.
Nothing is difficult, our passions, persistence and aims differs.
One lecturer, one class, similar notes, similar exam, twenty four hours in each day yet different results,Time management determines who will be an boss and an employee in a particular class?
You can compete with anyone and win, failure starts in the mind.
You were headed on the right direction until you said "What if i fail".
Nobody will employ you to make you a Millionaire, they will just pay you enough to make you report to work next day.
When you have value in you, great men will recognize you.
If you add a P in the word resident, the new word is President, A Positive idea can make you the next big thing
When you take drugs in campus you become a zombie.
...When you see Somebody doing that.., he/she is suffering from the POVERTY OF MIND
